name: A Little Viking
description:
A Little Viking is an epic adventure through 100 levels of monsters, traps and danger. Have you got the brains and fast reflexes to escape all 100 dungeons in this unique action puzzle game?

Bats will chase you, Ghosts will try and trick you, Monsters around every corner, Hazards include Spikes, Guillotines, Poison gas and more…

Have you got what it takes?
